name: Tori & Etorri - Space Runners
description:
Infinite runner in the space, with 3 levels of difficulty and different enemies in each level. This prototype was developed in one month using Construct 2, and it is starring Tori & Etorri are two friends who love to run and jump over the space.  

You can play with a friend and co-op, if one of you fall or loose all the health points, the other can pickup the yellow hearts to revive it.

Control Jump : 

- Tori, the car: Use any key of the keyboard

- Etorri, the little poop: Click with the mouse.

Music Credits:

Main theme while playing: 

Itty Bitty 8 Bit by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3933-itty-bitty-8-bit

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Drum intro made by me, combining this sound effects:

https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/

https://freesound.org/people/Lefty_Studios/

https://freesound.org/people/RutgerMuller/sounds/51247/

https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_4397472/sounds/414992/

https://freesound.org/people/Yajhaira/sounds/560163/

The procedural system of the  walls have some malfunction in their positions, and the yellow hearts sometimes spawn over them, I'm sorry for that bug, but this was my first attemt of do something playable with Construct 2 and I don't have the license anymore, so I must accept the entropy of the space walls in the prototype.
